about.missionText: At Bicifood we believe that eating well shouldn't harm the planet. That's why we work with organic and local products, and we make our deliveries exclusively by bicycle to reduce our carbon footprint.
about.frontendDesc: Specialists in interface design and user experience (UX).
about.backendDesc: System architects and database management experts.

section1.title: Introduction
section1.text: At BiciFood, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your information when you use our sustainable food delivery services.

section3.title: Data We Collect
section3.identificationText: Name, surname, ID (only if necessary for payment validation)
section3.contactText: Email address, phone number, delivery address
section3.navigationText: IP address, browser type, visit time, pages visited
section3.transactionText: Order history, payment method (without storing complete banking data)
section3.preferencesText: Language, preferred product categories, dietary restrictions

section4.title: Purpose of Processing
section4.intro: Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:
section4.item1: Management and processing of orders and deliveries
section4.item2: Communication about the status of your orders
section4.item4: Sending commercial communications (only with your consent)
section4.item5: Improvement of our services and personalization of user experience
section4.item6: Compliance with legal and fiscal obligations

section5.title: Legal Basis for Processing
section5.intro: The processing of your data is based on:
section5.contractText: To process your orders and provide our services
section5.consentText: For sending commercial communications and using non-essential cookies
section5.legalText: To comply with fiscal and accounting regulations
section5.legitimateText: To improve our services and ensure platform security

section6.title: Data Sharing
section6.intro: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
section6.logisticsText: Our delivery cyclists (they only receive the necessary delivery address)
section6.techText: Hosting, email and analytics services (with confidentiality agreements)

section7.title: Retention Period
section7.intro: We retain your personal data for:
section7.activeText: While you keep your account open
section7.ordersText: 5 years to comply with fiscal obligations
section7.footer: Once these periods have elapsed, the data will be deleted or anonymized.

section8.title: Your Rights
section8.intro: According to GDPR, you have the following rights:
section8.accessText: Obtain information about the data we process about you
section8.deletionText: Request the deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
section8.portabilityText: Receive your data in structured format and transfer it to another controller
section8.oppositionText: Object to the processing of your data
section8.footer: To exercise these rights, send an email to
section8.footerEnd: or write to us at our postal address.

section9.title: Security Measures
section9.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:
section9.item4: Restricted data access only by authorized personnel
section9.item5: Continuous training of our team in data protection

section10.title: Use of Cookies
section10.text: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through our cookie manager or your browser settings.

section11.title: International Transfers
section11.text: Your data is processed primarily within the European Economic Area (EEA). In case of transfers outside the EEA, we ensure that these are carried out with appropriate guarantees according to GDPR.

section12.title: Minors
section12.text1: Our services are aimed at people over 18 years old.
section12.text2: We do not intentionally collect data from minors under 14 years old without parental or legal guardian consent.

section13.title: Complaints
section13.intro: If you consider that we have not treated your data appropriately, you can file a complaint with:

section14.title: Changes to This Policy
section14.text: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy to adapt it to legislative changes or changes in our services. We will notify you of any significant changes by email or through a prominent notice on our website.

section15.title: Contact
section15.intro: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or about the processing of your personal data, you can contact us at:

acceptance.title: By using our services, you accept this privacy policy.
acceptance.text: If you do not agree with the processing of your data as described in this document, please refrain from using BiciFood.
